wikipedia_page.main: Nora Lilian Alcock, also known as Nora Lilian Lepart and Nora Lilian Leopard, (18 August 1874 – 31 March 1972) was a pioneer in the field of plant pathology and the first government-appointed plant pathologist in Scotland.

response: *Nora Lilian Alcock (1874–1972), British pioneer in plant pathologyAbbreviation in botany: N.L.Alcock who did research on fungal diseases
